heading: Meet Our Doctors
description: Our doctors' personalized, patient-first approach makes patients feel confident and valued, knowing they are receiving the highest level of dental care possible.

doctors.name: Scott Wingard, DMD
doctors.description: Enjoys improving his patients' quality of life and building trusting relationships, always keeping their best interest in mind.

doctors.name: Sherilyn Harper, DMD
doctors.description: Creates patient-centered relationships built on a foundation of respect, the power of good communication, and high-quality dentistry.

doctors.name: Ariel K. Bish, DMD
doctors.description: Understands the importance of involving patients in the decision-making process to achieve their best smile and oral health goals.

doctors.name: Lori Harrell, DDS
doctors.description: Educates early and involves patients in decisions regarding their smile and oral health, ensuring they feel well cared for.
